overview: It is the year 1856, President Juan Rafael Mora Porras calls on the citizens to fight to defend the newly achieved freedom of the nascent country. Women and men set out on the fuzzy road that leads to war. But - "those executioners" are not men? Won't they love their women too? - she whispers to him as they leave together, in a sigh ...
title: La Sangre de Nuestros Valientes
